task.title: Using Ditaform
task.shortdesc: Select from the available pieces of content and edit variables defined by the content authors.

step.cmd: New opens a new copy of the form.
Open opens a previously saved form.

step.info: When saving a project for the first time, opens a Save As dialog.

step.cmd: Save As creates a set of three files using the specified NAME.

ul.li: NAME-map.ditamap (map file) contains variable definitions and links to all of the content files.
NAME.ditamap (bookmap file) contains information about the document, a link to the NAME-map.ditamap file, and a list of selected translation languages.
NAME.ditaval (ditaval file) contains a list of all of the rows displayed in the form and tracks which ones are included in the document.

step.info: The selected languages are saved inside a <data> tag in the bookmap file.

step.cmd: Yellow text indicates a draft comment.

step.info: Missing dependencies are indicated in the left column in yellow.
